hits.name: 3HB Hotels
hits.description:
We are a Portuguese hotel group, currently with 5 hotels and 3 more to come. The 3HB Hotels brand was created in 2017 but our history started long before. 

We believe in informal, welcoming and vibrant environments that respects the local culture, design, food and habits. Our hotels have with unique characteristics and privilege service and experiences in tune with the natural surroundings.

Currently, our hotels are divided in 2 clusters: Concept and Holiday.

products.name: 3HB Clube Humbria
products.description: Located in Olhos de Água, about 850 meters from one of the most beautiful beaches of the Algarve, 3HB Clube Humbria is a modern and completely refurbished complex designed for families that are looking for an exclusive holiday in All Inclusive basis. Here guests will find all the services and facilities needed for a unforgettable holiday, such as a mini aqua park for children exclusively to our guests, kids club, multipurpose court, videogames room and day and evening entertainment.

products.name: 3HB Golden Beach
products.description: Located in the heart of Praia da Oura (Albufeira), this property has 54 apartments equipped with all the necessary facilities for an amazing holiday next to one of the most beautiful beaches of the Algarve. It is within walking distance from the best nightlife area, restaurants, shops and bars. The location, combined with the modern and comfortable style of the apartments, make 3HB Golden Beach a desirable destination for families or couples.

hits.name: ABTA - The Travel Association
hits.description: ABTA has been at the heart of travel for more than 70 years. We help our Members grow their businesses successfully & sustainably, so their customers travel with confidence. Our brand stands for support, protection, expertise & we  help our Members navigate through today's changing travel landscape by providing schemes of financial protection & a course of redress if something goes wrong; by raising standards in the industry & by giving guidance on issues from sustainability to health & safety; & by presenting a united voice to government to ensure the industry & the public get a fair deal.
hits.showObjective: We would love for all our Members & Partners to come & chat, ask any questions or just say hello! It's been a very long time & we can't wait to see our Travel Industry colleagues & friends again!

products.name: Food and Wine Tours and experiences
products.description: Food & Chic is a set of personally-tailored experiences created to turn your journey into a deep dive in the most regional and fascinating flavors of Italy! With the support of an exclusive network of the most famous food and wine experts, artisanal producers and Michelin stared chefs, we arrange luxury taste experience exclusively customized to your needs and wishes, closely tied to local Italian craft traditions.

products.name: Tailored Itineraries
products.description: The assistance and advice do come from experience of knowing Italy well. Personalized recommendations and reliable service are at your disposal. If you might need a spa treatment or a shopping guide, a booking for any event or Michelin star restaurant , seashore excursions or helicopter ride , personal guide or professionals drivers. We work with you to design your ideal encounter with the real Italy.

products.name: MICE

products.name: Raffles Bali
products.description: By bringing together the very best of local tradition and global culture, Raffles Bali is the destination of choice for well-traveled connoisseurs. It offers space, privacy and the discovery of authentic Bali in celebrated comfort.

products.name: Amarterra Villa Bali Nusa Dua - MGallery Hotel
products.description: Amarterra Villas Bali Nusa Dua-MGallery Hotel Collection is a luxurious private villa resort inspired by its environment and the everyday life of a traditional Balinese Village. The name Amarterra comes from “Amarta” which means water and “Terra” as earth. This exclusive boutique resort embodies the spirit of ancient Balinese culture and royalty from the historical Majapahit Kingdom.

products.name: Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort
products.description:
Located within the exclusive and serene five-star beach resort enclave of Bali's famous southern peninsula, 
Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort is a sumptuous retreat within close reach to Bali's tranquil and serene eastern coastline of Nusa Dua.
We are a 10 minutes drive from the airport, and a short-drive North to the water sport coastal area of Tanjung Benoa.

products.name: Hotel Excelsior Dubrovnik
products.description: When past guests have included kings, queens and Hollywood royalty, you know a hotel is going to be special. Hotel Excelsior Dubrovnik is exactly that, pairing luxury style with a passion for hospitality that saw it welcome guests throughout a turbulent 20th century. Today this landmark hotel remains one of the most enviable addresses in Dubrovnik.

products.name: Hotel Bellevue Dubrovnik
products.description: An icon of private boutique luxury and design, Hotel Bellevue Dubrovnik is carved into a cliffside, with floor-to-ceiling windows revealing the vast Adriatic. This five-star state-of-the-art seaside retreat is located just around the bay from Dubrovnik’s a magnificent 6th-century Old Town.

products.name: Hotel Dubrovnik Palace
products.description:
Awarded as "Europe’s finest five-star resort“ the hotel prides with its superb conference centre and spa facilities.
Sheltered by the quiet pine woods on the tip of Lapad peninsula the hotel's beachside location is just 4 km away from the city centre. Blended in the surrounding, all of its 308 contemporary rooms and suites have private balconies and beautiful Adriatic sea views.

products.name: Grand Villa Argentina
products.description: Set amongst pretty terraced gardens on a cliffside overlooking the Adriatic, five-star Grand Villa Argentina boasts exclusive waterfront views, direct beach access and a luxury spa, and is the optimum choice for a luxury seaside retreat in Dubrovnik.

products.name: Hotel Croatia Cavtat
products.description:
Situated across the bay from the historicwalls of Dubrovnik, Hotel Croatia Cavtat is a leading five-star resort and conference hotel on the southern part of Adriatic.
Hotel Croatia’s architecture blends seamlessly with its natural surroundings. Shaded by a pine tree forest, while offering spectacular sea views, all 487 accommodation units feature balconies which overlook the Adriatic sea or Cavtat Bay. State-of-the-art facilities include numerous gourmet restaurants, a spa center, and 2 beaches.

products.name: Hotel Kompas Dubrovnik
products.description:
Enjoying a sensational seafront setting overlooking Lapad beach and the blue-green Adriatic, the all-new 4+ star Hotel Kompas Dubrovnik offers great contemporary design,a luxury spa and outstanding dining and conference facilities with exemplary service.
Poised adjacent the beachfront of exquisite Lapad Bay and its famous tree-lined promenade called Uvala, Hotel Kompas Dubrovnik is under 4km from Dubrovnik’s magnificent medieval Old Town city centre.

products.name: Villa Glavić Dubrovnik
products.description: Villa Glavić, an intimate 21-room historical villa, offers its guests complete privacy with spectacular views to Dubrovnik Old Town.

products.name: Hotel Odisej Mljet
products.description: Set within the verdant pine and oak tree forest of Mljet National Park Hotel Odisej is a charming hotel well matched for an island escape unlike any other.

products.name: Hotel Supetar Cavtat
products.description: Hotel Supetar is a charming 28-room family hotel, situated in Cavtat, across the bay from Dubrovnik.

description.value: The 11-property portfolio includes a range of small, luxurious residences to outstanding resort facilities, professional management meeting venues to large congress services; all in Dubrovnik, and its surroundings.

products.name: Amari Galle Sri Lanka
products.description: Nestled on the golden sandy South Coast, only 10 minutes from the Galle Fort and 2 ½ hours from BIA.  172 guestrooms and suites are fully equipped with modern amenities and private balconies overlooking the Indian Ocean. There are four dining options, all-day dining at Āhāra Gourmet Gallery serving Asian and international dishes, Shoreline Beach Club, ORU seafood and Sforno Italian. Bommu Rooftop Bar for a refreshing cocktail and a breath-taking panoramic view of the Indian ocean.

products.name: OZO Colombo Sri Lanka
products.description: Cozy rooms complete with Sri Lankan charm. Sleep quality trumps and comfy beds rule. Give the snooze button a rest; waking early will be a breeze. We’ve got amazing local food with zest and spice to hit the spot and our ON14 rooftop lounge. Need a kick to get going in the mornings? Our EAT2GO Breakfast Boost will fire you up at the start of your day. Located a couple minutes from Galle Road and an hour’s drive from Bandaranaike International Airport, we’re close enough to the city centre.

products.name: OZO Kandy Sri Lanka
products.description: In the land of the spiritual. Cozy rooms inspired by Sri Lankan charm. Stunning views over the mist-covered mountains. Sublime beds that'll give you sleep so deep, you’ll be waking up before the alarm goes off with ease. Unwind at BOMMU rooftop lounge with a drink, snack and a side of fresh mountain breeze. Where hill country meets heritage city, we offer easy access and easy escape. Two hour’s drive from Bandaranaike International Airport, we’re your home away from home in Kandy.

products.name: The Villas Wadduwa Sri Lanka
products.description: The Villas Wadduwa is a perfect juxta positioning of classical Sinhalese architecture styled as a Walauwa (manor house that has a large house in a huge property) with chic contemporary decor. Resting on the shores of the southern coast this 32 Villa resort is your summer beach getaway complete with private plunge pools, spa, gym, a golden sandy beach and of course an international fusion of cuisine to keep your taste-buds tingling.

products.name: American Queen Voyages - River
products.description: The mighty rivers of the United States of America once served as the great highways of early exploration and inspired dreams of discovery. Today, American Queen Voyages™ re-creates the same sense of wonder, excitement and inspiration with all the convenience and comfort of modern luxury aboard the most elegant riverboats in the world, the American Queen®, American Empress®, American Duchess™ and American Countess™.

products.name: American Queen Voyages - Lakes and Ocean
products.description: American Queen Voyages™ invites travelers to throw away the guidebook and go off the beaten path to discover the unscripted experiences of North America. Sailing on identical 202-passenger ships, Victory I® and Victory II™ offer small-ship cruising with immersive shore excursions and onboard programming to Canada, the Great Lakes, New England and the Eastern Seaboard, Mexico and the Yucatán Peninsula

products.name: American Queen Voyages - Expedition
products.description: This is Alaska as you never imagined. Our Expedition cruises connect you to the people and cultures in remote indigenous villages. Be wholly aware of the rare access you will enjoy aboard our luxury vessels – and the value of protecting this delicate environment. As we cruise along the Pacific coast, guests can explore coastal secrets, stunning waterfalls, ancient glaciers, and hidden villages in the company of our exclusive world-class expedition partners.

hits.name: Aminess Hotels & Campsites (Laguna Novigrad Ltd)
hits.description:
Aminess Hotels & Campsites is one of the largest tourist companies in Croatia based in Novigrad, Istria. In its portfolio it has a total of 12 hotels, 4 camps, a village of 80 villas and 92 apartments. It operates in the most attractive destinations in Croatia; Istria, on the island of Krk and in Dalmatia on the Peljesac peninsula and the island of Korcula, with a total capacity of 4,850 accommodation units.
We see every event as a chance to offer you professional and friendly service. Take advantage of it at our top seaside locations in Istria, on the island of Krk or the Pelješac Peninsula.

with an array of sumptuous accommodation,
delicious flavours, thrilling desert activities
as well as a signature blend of indulgences,
Arabian hospitality and contemporary charm.

name.value: Desert Island Resort & Spa by Anantara

description.value:
Feel the spirit of Arabia in this desert sanctuary. Gaze at endless panoramas
of rolling dunes and turquoise ocean. Watch pink flamingos frolic across the
island’s lakes. Experience the vision of Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan, the
late ruler and founding father of the UAE, in this exclusive desert resort.

name.value: Al Yamm Villa Resort by Anantara

description.value:
Be charmed by wading flamingos as they make their way along the shore.
Located on the eastern shores of Sir Bani Yas Island, Anantara Al Yamm
offers luxury beachside villas reminiscent of an old fishermen’s village.

name.value: Al Sahel Villa Resort by Anantara

description.value:
Admire the wonders of Arabian wildlife as they wander through the lush
savannah. Breathe in the exotic atmosphere as desert plants sway in
the afternoon breeze. Discover a holiday escape where care is taken to
support the wildlife and environment. More than just a hotel, the villas
marry the delights of discovery with a philosophy designed to support
local creatures, flora and fauna.

hits.name: Apullacta Expeditions
hits.description: For more than 25 years Apullacta Expeditions has involved their clients in unforgettable experiences through coexistence with nature, ancestral communities and adventure, presenting Ecuador with all its geographical and cultural richness. Their daily work is to tailor the perfect tour for their guests by exceeding their expectations through creative itineraries and offering the most diverse experience during their visit with a focus on the experience of nature, culture and local lifestyle. Because only a local knows the best places to visit in Ecuador!
hits.showObjective: They are TourCert certified and work under the principles of sustainable tourism by promoting biodiversity and working with local naturalists and guides to support community tourism.

hits.name: ARAGON
hits.description: Tourism Board of Aragon, component body of the Government of Aragon (Spain), is a public entity that promotes Aragon tourism through advertising campaigns, promotion acts and venues, exhibitions in fairs, organizing famtrips or via reportages in media, among many other actions. Aragon is a destination whose brand values are: Nature, adventure&active tourism, experiences, snow sports, urban, culture&heritage, charming villages, specific tourism products like slowdriving, fishing, birding, mudejar art, gastronomy&enotourism, astrotourism, camping, and family tourism.
hits.showObjective: Visit the authentic Spain, inland territory, vast lands, breathtaking mountains. Amazing tourist experiences. Nature, heritage, gastronomy, patrimony that inspire joy of missing and emotions.

products.name: Slowdriving Aragon
products.description: Slow Driving routes in Aragon. Discover the unique routes where you can enjoy Aragon and its surroundings. Enjoy the trip, without being in a hurry, without speed. Just you, marvellous surroundings and the road. Open the windows, feel the air, feel every curve. Enjoy the colours, the landscapes, the smells and corners that you didn’t think existed. Aragon is the perfect place for it, with roads that run through different and spectacular places.

AS HOTELS  (MILAN-MONZA-ITALY)
hits.description:
AS Hotels is a young hotels group including five 4-star hotels with almost 600 rooms in the North Milan area (just 15 km from the city). All of the locations are close to the main motorway junctions and to Milan airports (Malpensa, Linate, Orio al Serio) , few kilometers far from Rho-Pero exhibition center, Bergamo, Monza and Como lake area. 
Every hotel offers complimentary parking for cars and buses, high-quality and tasty restaurants and meeting rooms for events up to 400 people. No city tax.

products.name: AS Hotels (Milan - Monza - Italy)
products.description:
AS Hotels is a young hotels group including five 4-star hotels with almost 600 rooms in the North Milan area (just 15 km from the city). All of the locations are close to the main motorway junctions and to Milan airports (Malpensa, Linate, Orio al Serio) , few kilometers far from Rho-Pero exhibition center, Bergamo, Monza and Como lake area. 
Every hotel offers complimentary parking for cars and buses, high-quality and tasty restaurants and meeting rooms for events up to 400 people. No city tax.

products.name: AS Hotel Limbiate Fiera****
products.description: A new design hotel north of Milan, located in Limbiate on S.P. 527 Monza - Saronno, in a strategic position to reach Milan city centre, Monza race, Como lake, Rho-Pero and Milano City exhibition centres. Includes: 183 design rooms including standard, business, economy, junior, suites and family rooms. Corso Como 52 Restaurant, Bistrot & Lounge Bar and a Congress Centre for events up to 400 people (natural daylight). No city tax in our property.

products.name: AS Hotel dei Giovi****
products.description:
A recently renovated hotel in a central position between Milan and Como, on S.P. 35 Milano-Meda highway exit 9 Binzago, in proximity to Pedemontana Lombarda A36 and about a 30 minutes from the airports of Linate, Malpensa, and Orio al Serio.  Includes: 134 completely renovated rooms including standard, business, economy and suite; Ristorante Mediterraneo and 2 meeting rooms that can hold events up to 100 participants and outdoor
complimentary parking space available for all. City tax free

products.name: AS Hotel Cambiago****
products.description: A quality hotel in a strategic position just outside Milan, easily reachable from the A4 motorway Cambiago/Cavenago exit; perfect to reach Bergamo and Milan city centre in 15 minutes, the hotel is well connected with Rho-Pero exhibition centre, Linate and Orio al Serio airports and also with Monza International Race Track. Includes: 140 rooms (standard, business, family rooms and apartmens), Mama's Kitchen Restaurant and 3 modern meeting rooms up to 100 participants and Armonia Wellness Spa

products.name: AS Hotel Monza****
products.description: Warm and classical stylish hotel, located in the heart of Monza, just 4 km from the Race Track and a few minutes from the centre of Milan. For those who love the classical style: 66 rooms including standard and two story-suite. Taverna dei Sapori: the restaurant is the jewel of the hotel, the location is welcoming like a typical tavern, the atmosphere is friendly and familiar like home and can host up to 150 people, wine cellar is refined and selected. Business meeting up to 60 people

products.name: AS Hotel Sempione Fiera****
products.description: A completely renovated modern hotel, located in a strategic position on S.S. del Sempione, a few minutes from Milan city centre, from Malpensa Airport and exhibition centre Rho-Pero, Malpensa and Milano City; Elegance and Comfort, includes: 82 rooms including standard, business; Il Minestraio Restaurant&Pizzeria;  Meeting and events only a few minutes from exhibition centre: an elegant lofted meeting room and endowed with the newest technologies that can hold up 90 participants. City tax free

products.name: Corso Como 52 Restaurant, Bistrot & Lounge Bar
products.description: Corso Como 52 Restaurant, Bistrot & Lounge Bar: refined and spacious location able to host up to 400 guests, where you can taste meat and fish dishes prepared in traditional way and also international courses. A cozy bistrot for fast tasty meals, bright outdoor patio suitable for events, happy hours and for relaxing and trendy breaks.

products.name: Ristorante Mediterraneo
products.description: Ristorante Mediterraneo: a warm elegant and classical stylish location that can hold up to 200 guests. Here you can try the pleasure of the typical Mediterranean cuisine in particular fish specialties, and international dishes as well.

products.name: Taverna dei Sapori Restaurant
products.description: Taverna dei Sapori: the restaurant is the jewel of the hotel, the location is welcoming like a typical tavern, the atmosphere is friendly and familiar like home and can host up to 150 people, wine cellar is refined and selected. The cuisine has a traditional Italian style, where you can eat excellent meat.

products.name: Congress Centre at AS Hotel Limbiate Fiera****
products.description:
A convention centre next to Milan: reserved entry with 7 modular rooms suitable for meetings and events up to 400 participants. 
Natural light, complimentary wide uncovered parking, with 170 parking lots.

products.name: Congress Centre at AS Hotel Cambiago****
products.description: Meeting rooms a few minutes from Milan: 3 modern meeting rooms with natural lights suitable for small meetings and for corporate events up to 100 participants; it is available a wide free outdoor parking for all guests.

products.name: Congress Centre at AS Hotel dei Giovi****
products.description: Your business meeting up to you: 2 meeting rooms that can hold up to 100 participants, really bright and equipped with all inclusive, state-of-the-art technologies, wide outdoor complimentary parking space available for all the guests.

products.name: Congress Centre at AS Hotel Sempione Fiera****
products.description: Meeting and events only a few minutes from exhibition centre: an elegant lofted meeting room and endowed with the newest technologies that can hold up 90 participants. A complimentary covered and uncovered parking for all guest.

products.name: Meeting Room at AS Hotel Monza****
products.description: Business meeting in a fascinating location: an elegant meeting room for company conferences, for job interviews, with dedicated access and convenient parking spaces for all the participants.

products.name: Armonia Wellness Spa
products.description: Armonia Wellness Spa: take a break in a relaxing wellness area with swimming pool, sauna, Turkish bath, jacuzzi, relaxing zone and fitness area where you can keep fit, different beauty treatments and massages.

products.name: Rooms at AS Hotel Cambiago****
products.description: 140 rooms including business, economy, suites, family rooms and residence apartments. Residence, the right solution for extended stays, spacious and well-lighted apartments on two floors, which can host up to 4 people.

hits.name: Asialink Holidays
ASIAN TRAILS
hits.description: Asian Trails’ experience in designing exceptional experiences continues to cast an intimate spell: the mesmerizing bonds we have with our destinations are amongst the closest one can find – be it a dreamy hideaway along sandy shores or a breathtaking moment overlooking its authentic vastness. It is all in delivering that perfect moment, where a second of tasting our Asia delivers a moment of eternal gratitude for all it encompasses.
hits.showObjective: Our in-depth spans from the captivating side of the Peninsula to the Borneo jungles. Aiming to explore sustainably, it is Asian Trails Malaysia that leads the way in blazing new paths in travel.

products.name: Kuala Lumpur’s finest by bicycle
products.description: Guided by the principle that there is more than meets the eye once you hop on a bike and cycle through Kuala Lumpur, this half day exploration is an example of elation and surprises during and after ‘saddling up’. 4 hours of showing you the essence of KL.

products.name: Tip of Borneo and Kudat Rungus Long House
products.description: The Tip of Borneo. Home of renowned views across two seas meeting together, longhouses and artisans keeping handicraft traditions alive. It’s a day where nature and culture effortlessly meet and intertwine perfectly, away from Kota Kinabalu’s city life.

products.name: Online Approach To Saving Malaysia’s Turtles
products.description:
The driving force behind the protection of turtles around Terengganu, East Malaysia, has devised an innovative virtual show to raise awareness about its mission.

The Turtle Conservation Society of Malaysia (TCS) has created a one-hour cyberspace tour to take guests around its sanctuary. The ‘excursion’ showcases over nine types of freshwater turtle specimens, the terrapin hatchery and it ends with a Q&A session.

products.name: Payar Paradise of Langkawi’s Coast
products.description: Away from it all but merely a short boat ride away. Langkawi’s collection of islands are dream destinations beyond your wildest dreams. From seeing the world through your snorkel mask to simply enjoy the sun, sea and sand, an exotic escape awaits.

description.value: Asian Trails’ experience in designing exceptional experiences continues to cast an intimate spell: the mesmerizing bonds we have with our destinations are amongst the closest one can find – be it a dreamy hideaway along sandy shores or a breathtaking moment overlooking its authentic vastness. It is all in delivering that perfect moment, where a second of tasting our Asia delivers a moment of eternal gratitude for all it encompasses.

showObjective.value: Our in-depth spans from the captivating side of the Peninsula to the Borneo jungles. Aiming to explore sustainably, it is Asian Trails Malaysia that leads the way in blazing new paths in travel.
